description: Slut Albright is run through the rigors of the Pope and Goddess Soma in this third day of slave training. She is made to endure punishing spanking and humiliating boot worship under the watchful eyes of the two sadistic slave trainers. Once exhausted she is staked out on the ground, intimidated with a blow torch, and covered in hot wax before being flogged clean.
title: Training Anikka Albright Day 3
